title: fo-10: Agent and KV Store
description:
Create the chip generation agent and KV store seed entries for FO-10.

## Spec
`docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md`

## Key Files
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-10/chip-agent.ts` — simpler than FO-09 discovery agent, chip-only
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-10/affirmation-agent.ts` — reuse or adapt FO-09's affirmation agent
- `src/db/seeds/fo-10.ts` — KV store prompts for chip generation (step-specific templates)
